name: A Vítima de Ouro
storyline:
Elisabeth Fleur is an extremely intelligent and perceptive young woman, but she never imagined that she would find herself involved in a mystery that would challenge even the most experienced of detectives: the murder of millionaire Julius Absolom.

The old mansion on the isolated Lighthouse Island serves as the stage for the investigation of this terrible crime. In the mood for mystery books, get to know the indie game The Golden Victim and help Elisabeth in the investigation to try to uncover the real culprit.

Wander the halls and rooms of the mansion, collect clues, and question all the suspects. Don't trust anyone because everyone is a suspect and anyone could be the culprit!
summary: A Vítima de Ouro is a point-and-click mystery adventure where you follow Elisabeth Fleur, who's investigating the murder of millionaire Julius Absolom on the isolated Lighthouse Island.
